name: WatchTower (RyansVideoGameProjects)
description:
Greeting Captain! 

This is [Major Control].

Congratulations on your recent promotion as captain of the [Watchtower], one of our grand [Mobile Defense Stations!]

You are stationed within the orbit of a [Newly Discovered Planet].

It is [Rich in Vital Resources] and contains intelligent life that we have initiated communications with. 

Our scouts have recently detected the presence of [Enemy Vessels] in this sector. 

We believe they are attempting a scorched earth campaign of [Total Annihilation] against any planets we have shown interest in. 

Your mission: [Protect This Planet At All Cost!]

You can move the station with the [ARROW KEYS]. You can move around the planet with [LEFT and RIGHT], as well as in and out of its orbit with [UP and DOWN].

You also have access to an [Ion Cannon] to fight off enemy invaders, which you shoot using the [SPACE KEY]  

Be warned: This defense station still has the [LAST RESORT PROTOCOL] active.

Getting too close to the planet will cause it to self-engage, [Crashing the Station into the Planet!]

[Failure is Not an Option!]

[The Empire Smiles Upon You!]

***

This game was made by:

Timothy Ryan Scully

Bernadine Diluzio

Shamus O’Connor
